original_text: The soil causes the plants to grow. The leaves of the plant grow first. Then the flowers appear. Then the plant makes new seeds.
korean_text: 땅이 스스로 열매를 맺되 처음에는 싹이요 다음에는 이삭이요 그 다음에는 이삭에 충실한 곡식이라

sentences.original_text: The soil causes the plants to grow.
The leaves of the plant grow first.
Then the plant makes new seeds.
